summary: Changes Frost's vanilla model to Arvak and gives him Frost resist and a "Frost Cloak" effect when in combat.
descriptionHtml:
Frost kind of seemed lame for being one of the "unique" horses of Skyrim and thus I changed him a bit.

[list]
[*]Vanilla Arvak model (skeleton-colored bones+white flames) as Frost. Has Frost resist (100%) and a Frost Cloak when in combat.
[*]Vanilla Arvak model (skeleton-colored+blue flames) as Frost. Has Frost resist (100%) and a Frost Cloak when in combat.
[*]Vanilla Arvak model (skeleton-colored with no flames) as Frost. Has Frost resist (100%) and a Frost Cloak when in combat.
[*]Frost Atronach Arvak from Arvak Rewritten. Has Frost resist (100%) and a Frost Cloak when in combat.
[*]Vanilla Frost (no model/texture changes) with Frost Resist (100%) and a Frost Cloak when in combat.

[/list]
author: Othienka
